pages.text: In the $(thing)Savannahs$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(), you will encounter dried clay lake beds. Though the top layer is cracked, the layer below is just enough to support life. Burrowed in this layer of $(item)Virgin Gray Clay$() lurks the $(thing)Desert Fish$(), whose $(item)Swim Bladders$() are able to reduce $(thing)Toxicity$() when eaten. They can be lured out by breaking the clay, or wetting it with $(item)Water$().

pages.title: Virgin Gray Clay
pages.text: The $(item)Virgin Clay$() where $(thing)Desert Fish$() hide. Break or Wet it to expose them.
